description: Chai Pi is the platform that has taken inspiration from real-life needs and love for Tea. No matter where you are, who you are and in which situation you are, Tea is something to turn to.

There are numerous instances when we actually need a Tea for no good reason. In the office, at a co-working space or at a home. Situation falls such that we just crave for a sip of tea or coffee and a munch of chat. And stepping out is simply messy. However, not every time a hygienic and tasty tea is handy. To tackle up with this very common scenario, we came up with Chai pi to quench your thirst for Tea at any time and anywhere.
Your cup is just a tap away, with Chai pi.
